articles.author: Juliana Liu
articles.title: Huawei’s new homegrown Chinese smartphone takes on Apple and Android - CNN
articles.description: Huawei has unveiled a new flagship phone boasting entirely homegrown software that aims to give users an alternative to Google’s Android or Apple’s iOS, in another effort by the Chinese tech giant to defend against possible further sanctions by Washington.
articles.content:
Editors Note: Sign up for CNNs Meanwhile in China newsletter which explores what you need to know about the countrys rise and how it impacts the world.
